entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
